title: The first step, towards heaven, or Anna the prophetesse sacred haunt, to the temple of God. Preached at Standish Church in the Countie of Lancaster. By VVilliam Leigh, Batchillor of Diuinity and paster there. With the second edition of great Brittaines deliuerance, newly corrected and enlarged by the author.
author: Leigh, William, 1550-1639.
publisher: Printed by Nicholas Okes, for Arthur Johnson, and are to be sold at his shop in Paules Churchyard at the signe of the white horse ouer against the great North doore of Paules,
